burgerAndSandwiches.special: *Thoroughly cooking foods of animal origin such as beef, eggs, fish, lamb, milk, poultry, or shelifish reduces the risk of foodborne illness. Individuals with certain health conditions may be at a higher risk if these foods are consumed raw or undercooked.
